name: treatment of used trawler, steel | used trawler, steel | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/18517/documentation

This dataset represents the end of life of steel trawlers, per 1000 kg of light ship weight, based on data from Peru (2004-3013), corresponding to 9 vessels (from a fleet of 54) for which data was avilable with different levels of detail. Specific data for specific inventory items may be based on sub-samples for which detailed data was available. Vessel dimensions: 34 - 275 m3 (16 - 34 m length).;System boundaries and relation between activities

Treatment of used vessel (recycling)

End of life (decommissioning). Excludes engines and motors. Excludes energy for dismantling.
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/03:Fishing and aquaculture/031:Fishing/0311:Marine fishing
tags: Sector: Waste Treatment & Recycling; Fishing & Aquaculture

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Peru features various shipyards and relevant ship-building and ship-retrofitting expertise.

exchanges.description: EOL of a trawler, per 1000 kg of light ship weight (LSW), after 35 years lifetime. Regressions based on mainly primary data were created to relate the weight of each inventory item to a purse seiner's LSW, adjusted for trawler's gear. The list of inventory items (granularity) contribute >95% of environmental impacts, as described in the reference publication.
